s1.name: Contacts
s1.subtitle: JORAM community
s1.p: The JORAM community is reachable through the joram@objectweb.org forum.
For joining this community, you may subscribe.
For getting in touch with the JORAM development team only, send a mail to the joram-team@objectweb.org address (this address is not meant to get support requests).
s1.subtitle: JOnAS community
s1.p: The JOnAS community includes skilled people using JORAM/JMS within the JOnAS application server. It is reachable through the jonas@objectweb.org forum.
